scripts.clean: git checkout HEAD -- sandbox && git clean -f -d sandbox
scripts.launch: cd sandbox && yarn && yarn ng g schematic-starter:schematic-starter
scripts.launch:schematic:noPrompts: yarn link:sandbox && cd sandbox && yarn && yarn ng g schematic-starter:schematic-starter
scripts.link:schematic: yarn link && cd sandbox && yarn link schematic-starter
scripts.test: yarn build:clean:launch && yarn test:sandbox && yarn clean
scripts.test:sandbox: cd sandbox && yarn lint && yarn test && yarn e2e && yarn build
